title: Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2009 (No. 22 of 2009), hereby make
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations – 

“the Principal Regulations” means the Social Housing Assessment 
Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 84 of 2011) 

Amendment of Regulation 19 (Income Limits) of the Principal Regulations.

title: Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2009 (No. 22 of 2009), hereby make
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations amend the Social Housing Assessment Regulations 2011 
(S.I. No. 84 of 2011 ) to— 

• Remove the cap on percentage increases in relation to the income 
eligibility threshold in respect of each household member aged less than 
18 years; 

• Provide for a revised Schedule containing an updated social housing 

support application form. 

The Regulations come into force on 19th April 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 28 [116]
